meanings.sent1: The architectural style of the building was very modern and sleek.
meanings.sent2: The city is known for its beautiful architectural landmarks.
meanings.sent3: The architectural plans for the treehouse were surprisingly intricate.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an architectural masterpiece, full of intricate details and designs.
meanings.sent5: The architectural details of the castle made it look like a fairy tale come to life.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the design and construction of buildings.
meanings.sent1: The architectural firm was responsible for designing the new office building.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed the architectural aspects of the construction project.
meanings.sent3: The architectural challenge of building a house on a cliff was daunting.
meanings.sent4: His speech was an architectural marvel, carefully constructed and well-designed.
meanings.sent5: The architectural blueprint laid out the exact specifications for the new bridge.
